Do you really want to upgrade scanner firmware?
Warning: Software is restarted automatically afterwards. Warning: Software might not respond during firmware upgrade. Please do NOT unplug or switch off the scanner, and do NOT close the software! Otherwise the scanner device could get damaged.
Do you want to continue?
No installed and or licensed scanner plugin found.
The scanner plugin is not licensed for execution.

Warning!
Clicking the 'Back' button causes termination of scan process. Already scanned data will be lost. Do you want to abort scan?
Optical scan body + reference scan
Measures optical scan abutments and takes a reference scan in order to be able to match optical scan abutments to scan data captured with optical scanner
Optical scan body
Measure optical scan abutments
Tactile scan body + reference scan
Measures tactile scan bodies (cylinder scan) and takes a reference scan in order to be able to match tactile scan bodies to scan data captured with optical scanner
Antagonist scan will not be executed as neither upper nor lower jaw contains only healthy teeth or antagonists.
